sourcesContent: Year Name NSman/SV SAFRA System Offset BCP Others Total {{ record.year }} {{ record.name }} {{ record.nsmanSV }} {{ record.safra }} {{ record.systemOffset }} {{ record.bcp }} {{ record.others }} {{ record.total }} import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'n2-company-payment-tab', templateUrl: './company-payment-tab.component.html', styleUrls: ['./company-payment-tab.component.scss'] }) export class CompanyPaymentTabComponent implements OnInit { sampleData = [ { year: "2020", name: "Tan Ah Kow", nsmanSV: "1234.56", safra: "40.00", systemOffset: "100.00", bcp: "50.00", others: "0.00", total: "1424.56" }, { year: "2019", name: "Lim Ah Seng", nsmanSV: "2345.67", safra: "50.00", systemOffset: "50.00", bcp: "50.00", others: "0.00", total: "2495.67" }, { year: "2018", name: "Goh Ah Beng", nsmanSV: "1345.67", safra: "40.00", systemOffset: "100.00", bcp: "50.00", others: "0.00", total: "1535.67" }, { year: "2017", name: "Tan Ah Kow", nsmanSV: "1456.78", safra: "50.00", systemOffset: "50.00", bcp: "50.00", others: "0.00", total: "1606.78" } ] constructor() { // to do } ngOnInit(): void { // to do } exportCSV(): void { // to do } }
